boq_context:

section_context_for_this_product_block: E | POWER & Control CABLE TERMINATION Including Glands, lugs, cable tags, Cable ferrules, Cable ties etc. as Cable Schedule
product_entries.full_product_description: 31 | 1.1kV grade, 85 deg C rating, control cables with stranded copper conductors, PVC Insulation, extruded PVC, FRLS Inner sheath (Type- ST2), round wire/strip armour as specified elsewhere in the specification and extruded PVC, FRLSH overall sheath (Type-ST2). | 3Cx2.5 sqmm Cu | Termination Kit
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: voltage: 1.1kv, temperature rating: 85 deg c, conductor material: copper, insulation: pvc (polyvinyl chloride), inner sheath: frls (flame retardant low smoke) pvc (polyvinyl chloride) type-st2, armour: round wire/strip, overall sheath: frlsh (flame retardant low smoke halogen) pvc (polyvinyl chloride) type-st2, kit type: termination kit
